partnership.title: Partnership with Torat Ha’adam La’adam Institute
partnership.description: Ten10 was developed in partnership with the Torat Ha’adam La’adam Institute – one of the leading institutes in the field of practical halacha. The institute guided the entire development process and approved the accuracy of all halachic calculations in the system. Over a long period, the institute published various versions of Excel tables for tithe and chomesh calculations, which gained great public popularity with over 3,500 orders in Israel. Following the high demand and numerous requests, the institute decided to collaborate with an expert programmer to create a completely new system – modern, convenient, and advanced – that incorporates all the advantages of previous versions, alongside upgrades and new functions that will provide a fast, accurate, and pleasant user experience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We've compiled the answers to questions that usually come up

items.question: How is my data protected?
items.answer: Data security is our top priority. In the computer version, all data is saved in a local SQLite file on your personal computer only - without internet connection or sharing with external parties. In the website version, data is encrypted and saved in secure PostgreSQL with Row Level Security (RLS).

items.question: Is the application free?
items.answer: Yes, the application is completely free for personal use. Our goal is to help the masses and assist in fulfilling the mitzvah of tithing.

items.question: Is an internet connection required?
items.answer: It depends on the version you choose. In the computer software (Windows) there is no need for internet connection at all - all data is saved on your computer. The website version requires internet connection to enable sync and access from anywhere.

items.question: Can I import existing data?
items.answer: Yes! The system supports data export and import. You can export your data to a JSON file and import them between the computer software and website versions, so you can switch between them easily.

items.question: Can I use the system on mobile too?
items.answer: Yes, the website version is adapted for use on smartphones. In addition, it can be installed as a web app (PWA) to provide a convenient and fast user experience like a regular application.
